title: Banana Split Cheesecake
ingredients: ['450g vanilla biscuits, crushed', '225g margarine, melted', '1 1/3 (432g) tins crushed pineapple, drained', '6 bananas, sliced', '225g cream cheese', '250g icing sugar', '200ml double cream, whipped', '4 tablespoons chopped walnuts', '8 glace cherries, halved']
